website_summaries.verdict: Dresser that doubles as a changing table to help you conserve space in the nursery.
pros: Available in three different finish options of ebony, espresso, or white
Comes with a changing pad and a safety strap
Has a lip in the changing table area to keep the baby in place
Uses safety stops on all three drawers when the baby begins moving around
cons: Finish seems to scratch more easily than it should

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction.
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to put together. In total, probably took 45 mins to assemble from start to finish. Solid construction. Only complaint is that paint scratches fairly easily. If you are using a diaper caddy, expect the paint to be removed from those areas. Fortunately we purchased this in black so touch up are simple with a black sharpie. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Teen and Tot 💕

customer_reviews.title: Why would I receive that pad
customer_reviews.text: To start off why would something like that changing pad in the picture be sent. Bottom rail was dented making bottom drawer difficult to use. A few chunks taken out also. Ordered the matching crib also and that also had gauges taken out of it. Bottom Drawer is dented and very hard to open/ close.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the price. A bit of a pain to put together (As most self assembled furniture is). The pad it comes with is very thin, but options are given to purchase different size contoured changing pads on the page. Baby is not born yet, but so far, no issues, and it looks great in the nursery.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Rickerson

customer_reviews.title: Time consuming but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Not so easy to put together. Needed help to keep the assembly moving.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: real pine wood. easy to put together. everything fit right. it's BIG!! was a little worried after reading some of the reviews but did not experience any of the negatives other have.
customer_reviews.author: K.B.

customer_reviews.title: item choice
customer_reviews.text: there was nothing wrong with item except mom to be wanted a different one
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Assembly was so easy! Great product and very well built
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was so easy! Great product and very well built. No complaints at all. My wife and I put it together in 45 minutes tops.
customer_reviews.author: cory

customer_reviews.title: Nice changer dresser
customer_reviews.text: The dresser serves its purpose. It was purchased for my daughter for her baby shower gift and since the baby has arrived she has used it a lot. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: MHarris

customer_reviews.title: There were chips on the finish of a couple of ...
customer_reviews.text: There were chips on the finish of a couple of drawers, as well as the drawers were not as smooth to operate as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: B. Adler

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it matched my other furniture that cost WAY more money. It stands up to those pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, challenging directions
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this along with the Jayden crib and it looks great and is sturdy. The directions weren't completely clear but with furniture, when are they ever? I just advise having a little patience.
customer_reviews.author: BrandeyandChris

product_meta.title: Jayden 3 Drawer Changer Dresser in Ebony
product_meta.description:
Color:EbonyClean and classic, the Jayden 3-Drawer Changer Dresser is a timeless nursery staple. The dresser includes a changing tray on top with three spacious drawers below for all of baby's supplies.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
DaVinci Decor's first muse, Jayden is a revival of classic style. Engineered for safety and quality, this collection gives baby years of stylish comfort. Jayden Collection is just what baby needs.
feature_bullets: DURABILITY: 3 spacious drawers that can hold all the adorable baby clothes, blanket, and more. We've built this dresser with features like stronger drawer bottoms to make it sturdier and long-lasting
SPACE-EFFICIENT DESIGN: With an included changing tray, this dresser doubles as a changing station and dresser!
SMOOTH GLIDE: Pre-installed euro glides that make opening the drawers easy even when your hands are full with baby
QUALITY MATERIAL: Made of solid sustainable New Zealand pinewood and TSCA compliant engineered wood -only the best for your baby

FOR YOUR BABY'S SAFETY:Say goodbye to toxic chemicals!Finished in a non-toxic multi-step painting process and lead and phthalate safe.Exceeds ASTM International and U.S. CPSC safety standards. Stop mechanism and anti-tip kit included for additional safety

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars21 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
